Stay well!

Here is our updated school calendar for the 2020-2021 academic year, approved by PCA's Board of Directors in accordance with state law.

Please note:

School begins on MONDAY, AUGUST 17th as required by state law. All scholars must attend the first days of school in order to keep their seats at Peak.

Our Thanksgiving, Winter, and Spring breaks remain the same as previously scheduled.

5 Remote Learning Days have been added as required by state law. Scholars will be assigned activities they are required to complete from home on those days.

We will attend school for 1110 instructional hours over 180 days in 2020-2021, in addition to the 5 Remote Learning Days.

There are 4 days on which all scholars will be dismissed at 11:30am, and an additional 2 days on which they will be dismissed at 1:15PM.
